content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5680,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/92209d56-c4f5-4777-86d8-4bae4e262aa5/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/92209d56-c4f5-4777-86d8-4bae4e262aa5/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"92209d56-c4f5-4777-86d8-4bae4e262aa5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":450,\"height\":88},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The world has changed, and our offices change too. The office today is no longer a place where people need to be tied to the same workplace with their team. Today you can work in hybrid working mode and visit the office a few days per week for collaboration.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are three types of working scenarios:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Work from office (WFO) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- you work from the office, and have a workplace assigned to you due to the nature of your work or job(clients) requirements, or you have no ability to work from home.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Workplace booking, check-in and check-out are performed using \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://desk.epam.com/app-react/about\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Desk.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://connect.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Connect\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" applications. Desk.epam.com and Connect let you check if there are available workspaces in the office, book one for yourself, your team, find where your colleagues are sitting, and much more.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More detailed information about office usage and the Desk.epam.com application can be found \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMOSM/Desk+User+Guides\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". If you have any questions, please contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://support.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/index.aspx/Policy/Work%20Instructions/Global%20Work%20Instructions/Work%20Instruction%20Workplace%20Management.aspx?OR=Teams-HL&CT=1646900858695&sourceId=&params=%7B%22AppName%22%3A%22Teams-Desktop%22%2C%22AppVersion%22%3A%2227%2F22010300411%22%7D\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"W. M. policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn more about options\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://Desk.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for EPAM off\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ice usage.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hybrid work(both from home & office) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- you have the flexibility of shifting from WFH or WFO scenarios to build your own work schedule (both from office or from home) based on the nature of your work -project or job function requirements. This is applicable for most employees in Nordics. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Work from home (WFH) only\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"text-align\":\"start\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":\"Calibri,sans-serif\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"107%\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11pt\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" â€“ you work only or primarily from your home. This is applicable for employees that lives outside of Gothenburg or Stockholm and are not readily available to work from company or client office.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"text-align\":\"start\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":\"Calibri,sans-serif\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"107%\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11pt\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"text-align\":\"start\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-family\":\"Calibri,sans-serif\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"line-height\":\"107%\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11pt\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you have intention to work remote outside of your primary location, please consult your Resource Manager (RM) and HR-contact at earliest convenience and prior to traveling. As working remote may result in insurance, legal, tax and/or policy & compliance issues depending on location and time span. door tag you've received on your first day in EPAM gives you  indefinite access to company offices in Stockholm and Gothenburg.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please do not lose your door tag or give it to colleagues or unauthorized persons! The door tag is personal.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions regarding this step, please address them to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAdministrativeSE@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Administrative SE\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
